5.3.1 What Is Exponential Smoothing?
Exponential smoothing is a time series forecasting method for univariate data. Time series
methods like the Box-Jenkins ARIMA family of methods develop a model where the prediction
is a weighted linear sum of recent past observations or lags. Exponential smoothing forecasting
methods are similar in that a prediction is a weighted sum of past observations, but the model
